name: AI tools
short_description:
http://code.google.com/p/state-event-action

  * Knowledge is a collection of stored and retained information
  * Intelligence is an ability to find associations between things in sorted form by the likelihood in a particular context
  * Things are connected == linked with each other by qualities == properties == associations
  * One thing is connected to another via a number of associations
  * Aggregation mechanisms of things and associations are the same
  * Objects and associations are dynamic in nature and may change in time that is depicted by the finite state machine notation presented here
